desc: The SWABBO Footwasher is the perfect solution to reducing cleaning time and minimising the discomfort of having sand all through the house. Continuous vacuuming and hosing feet are now history thanks to the clever use of a molded Footwasher and carefully constructed brushes to clean sand from feet.

layout.text: Peace Love And No Sandy Feet

The SWABBO Footwasher is the perfect solution to reducing cleaning time and minimising the discomfort of having sand all through the house.
New price $59.95(NZ)
